website_summaries.verdict: An ideal budget subwoofer that packs a surprising punch in volume and intensity.
pros: Solid, quality construction that is more durable than other budget models
4,000 maximum watt rating offers higher volume capability than most expensive options
cons: Connecting wires can develop distortion or audio drop outs if not properly installed

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I have built car audio systems in my vehicles and also fro friends for over 20 years this is the first time I went for the 15" sub so i went all out and bout 2 these subs sound absolutely incredible they are so loud I cracked my windshield lol all good though that was the sound I was looking for crystal clear LOUD BASS
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: A no go
customer_reviews.text: Even with a matching amp I'm not getting good bass
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sub at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed new subs after blowing my Sonys and i always wanted to upgrade to 15" subs. I found these subs on Amazon with great reviews and they do not disappoint! Sounds absolutely amazing for a $115 subwoofer! I am a Rockville fan for life. I am planning on purchasing the Rockville 2000w RMS amp soon to give them the power they need. Super happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Luebcke Sr.

customer_reviews.title: If you want bass that can be heard this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This K6 15” sub is hands down a good deal. I got it hooked up in a 2015 Chevy Cruze and it slaps hard. I would buy it again if anything happened to it.
customer_reviews.author: Steelers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this subwoofer for a while now and it just sounds amazing,would definitely recommend getting it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great sub!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been into subwoofers for a good while now and this is the best subwoofer for the money that I have ever had. Did not disappoint at all. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaine t.

customer_reviews.title: Great cost to performance ratio.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made subwoofer for the size and cost. I haven't had a chance to put it to the long term test yet, but it works great so far and sounds damn good.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory1953

customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price hell of a bang for ur buck

customer_reviews.text: Great sound, installs easy. We've bought a few of these for our fleet and have been very happy with them.

product_meta.title: Rockville W15K6D4 V2 15" 4000w Car Audio Subwoofer Dual 4-Ohm Sub CEA Compliant
feature_bullets: Rockville W15K6D4 V2 K6 Series 15" Dual 4-Ohm Car Subwoofer. Peak Power Handling: 4000 Watts. Program Power Handling: 2000 Watts. CEA Rated RMS Power Handling: 1000 Watts.
3" 4-Layer Black Aluminum Voice Coils Wound with OFC (100% Copper) Wire. The wire we use is made in the USA! It is one of the most important components to make the sub high quality and last longer.
Double Stacked 112 Oz High Quality Magnet. Cast Aluminum Basket With Black Sanded Finish Makes This Sub Very Efficient. Fiber Reinforced Ultra Stiff Black Non-Pressed Paper Cone.
Thick Foam Surround Provides Incredible Sound Quality With Minimal Distortion. Red Stitching Cone Reinforcement Ensures Long Life. Polypropylene (PP) Dustcap.
Two Chrome-Plated Binding Post Terminals - These are the best terminals on the market and they accept any gauge wire. Impedance: Dual 4-Ohm Voice Coils.
Vented Hole on T-yoke Enhances Heat Dissipation. Special Custom Rubber Boot Magnet Covers Make the Woofer Look Nice and Protects the Magnet.
Custom Rockville Mounting Gasket Looks Beautiful and Makes it Easy To Mount the Subwoofer Air-Tight. High BL Magnetic Motor Gap.
We use the highest grade black glue that handles extremely high temperatures which allows our woofer to handle even more power than they are rated. Cutout Diameter: 14.09” inches.
Mounting Depth: 7.4” inches. Frequency Response: 27 Hz - 1.5K kHz. 8mm T-Yoke + 8mm Washer. Sensitivity: 85dB. Sealed Enclosure Volume: 1.85 - 3.0 Cubic Feet.
Vented/Ported Enclosure Volume: 2.75 - 4.0 Cubic Feet. Weight: 19.84 Lbs. Shipping Weight: 24.25 Lbs. Shipping Box Dimensions: 18.19" x 18.19" x 13.19" Inches.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
